product_name: The North Face Plushee Fleece Bunting - Infant Girls'
long_description: The North Face Plushee fleece bunting for infant girls snuggles babies in soft and warm coverage from fuzzy head to tiny toes. Sherpa fleece fabric is toasty warm and comfortable; taffeta layer on chest makes spills and spit-ups easy to clean. Front zipper extends from the neck to the leg for easy dressing and undressing and diaper changes. The North Face Plushee fleece bunting features a full hood, elastic binding and fold-over cuffs at the hands and feet to provide additional protection in cold weather.
short_description: The North Face Plushee fleece bunting for infant girls snuggles babies in soft and warm coverage from fuzzy head to tiny toes.
subcategory: Kids' Snowsuits, Rain Suits And Buntings
